title: Wasfi Jabbar
text:
Wasfi Jabbar (born 1 July 1964) is a former <a href="Iraqi%20people">Iraqi</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who played for <a href="Iraq%20national%20football%20team">Iraq</a> at the <a href="1988%20Arab%20Nations%20Cup">1988 Arab Nations Cup</a>. 
Jabbar played for Iraq between 1983 and 1988.
